name: Concept Bubble
example:
<concept-bubble
  caption=""
  concept="Marketing Website"
  color-accent="lightblue"
  color-secondary="#142239"
  info="test" />
description: Web component that displays a heading inside a bubble for use in a concept map or similar.

attributes.name: concept
attributes.description: The caption to display after the number. For example, the number might be 100% and the text might be 'year over year increase in revenue'.
attributes.notes: The default will be an empty string if the attribute is not specified.
